**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-28T20:59:42Z" title="06/28/2016 08:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">June 28, 2016</time> by FawkesFTK**

It's pretty easy to leave Kerbin- turn on infinite fuel! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Welcome, enjoy your stay!

Hi FawkesFTK, welcome!

Be sure to check out the excellent [Tutorials](http%3A//forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials) and Videos in [Live from Mission Controls](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/53-Live-from-Mission-Control%21)
Hey, FawkesFTK! Glad to have you!
